data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Stirton, Charles H., Clark, V. Ralph, Barker, Nigel P., Muasya, A. Muthama (2011): Psoralea margaretiflora (Psoraleeae, Fabaceae): A new species from the Sneeuberg Centre of Floristic Endemism, Eastern Cape, South Africa. PhytoKeys 5: 31-38, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.5.1585, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.5.1585
